CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Two different types of photovoltaic devices were fabricated and characterized , with the device structures of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al and ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al shown in Figure 6.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer |
| PC71BM |
| LiF |
| Al |
| TiO x |

These are the materials mentioned in the paragraph that are used in the fabrication of photovoltaic devices.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Upon further examination, all of the entities identified in the previous answer are materials used in the device structures mentioned in the paragraph. Therefore, there are no entities to remove. Here is the updated Markdown table with the valid "Material Name" entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer |
| PC71BM |
| LiF |
| Al |
| TiO x |

These are the materials that are used in the fabrication of the photovoltaic devices mentioned in the paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Two different types of photovoltaic devices were fabricated and characterized , with the device structures of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al and ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al shown in Figure 6.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| polymer : PC71BM |
| LiF |
| Al |
| TiO x |

Explanation:

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are the names of the materials or layers used in the fabrication of the photovoltaic devices. These are:

* ITO (Indium Tin Oxide)
* PEDOT : PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) polystyrene sulfonate)
* polymer : PC71BM (a type of organic photovoltaic material)
* LiF (Lithium Fluoride)
* Al (Aluminum)
* TiO x (Titanium Oxide with variable stoichiometry)

These entities are mentioned as part of the device structures of the photovoltaic devices that were fabricated and characterized.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| PC71BM |
| LiF |
| Al |
| TiO x |

Explanation:

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to "Material property" are the names of the materials or layers used in the fabrication of the photovoltaic devices. These are:

* PEDOT : PSS (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) polystyrene sulfonate)
* PC71BM (a type of organic photovoltaic material)
* LiF (Lithium Fluoride)
* Al (Aluminum)
* TiO x (Titanium Oxide with variable stoichiometry)

The entity "ITO" (Indium Tin Oxide) was not included in the table because it is not a material property, but rather a material itself. The other entities "ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al" and "ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al" are device structures, not material properties.
